name: Liquified Creative
tagline: Discover the Many Arms of Marketing.
description:
Liquified Creative is an Annapolis-based traditional and digital marketing firm that is both results-driven and audience-conscious.
Founded in 2007, Liquified Creative was established on the mantra of transforming brands into living/breathing organisms that respond to the needs and demands of their audience. Collectively, our team carries well over 50+ years of professional experience in marketing, creative, web design and development, and branding. We believe that a successful approach consists of a well-balanced orchestration of market research, solid design tactics, comprehensive analytics, and seamless execution of campaigns in order to strengthen your organization’s impact in today’s marketplace.
READ MORE...
